    • Uses of Subject in space.arim.bans.api

      Methods in space.arim.bans.api that return Subject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Subject Subject.console()
      Gets the console

      Be careful! The console has unlimited permissions.
      static Subject Subject.fromIP(String address)
      Creates a Subject from an IP address
      Subject ArimBansLibrary.fromIpAddress(String address)
      Gets a Subject from an IP Address

      Use ArimBansLibrary.checkAddress(String) to validate the address first.
      static Subject Subject.fromUUID(UUID playeruuid)
      Creates a Subject from a player UUID
      Subject ArimBansLibrary.fromUUID(UUID uuid)
      Gets a Subject from a UUID
      Subject PunishmentResult.getApplicableSubject()
      Returns the subject about whom the PunishmentResult was asked
      default Subject PunishmentPlugin.getConsole()
      Returns the server console Subject
      Careful! The console has unbounded permissions.
      Subject Punishment.operator() 
      Subject ArimBansLibrary.parseSubject(String input)
      Gets a Subject from arbitrary user input

      Will automatically detect if IP address or UUID.
      static Subject Subject.serialise(String input)
      Serialises a subject
      Subject Punishment.subject()
